chunks.zh: 嘴唇总是起皮 唇膏也不好用 有什么药物推荐吗？
chunks.en: My lips are always peeling and lip balm doesn't work. Are there any medications recommended?

chunks.zh: 就是唇炎。直接买凡士林（最普通的那种），睡前厚涂就行
chunks.en: It's cheilitis. Just buy Vaseline (the most basic kind) and apply a thick layer before bed.

chunks.zh: 吃点维生素 B2 试试？我到冬天就一直吃 B2 ，主要是预防口角疮，我到冬天嘴唇太容易崩口了，而且还好的特别慢，一直吃 B2 就基本不会有问题。
chunks.en: Have you tried taking some Vitamin B2? I've been taking B2 every winter, mainly to prevent angular cheilitis. My lips are too prone to cracking in the winter, and they heal very slowly. Taking B2 regularly has basically eliminated the problem.

chunks.zh: 马林狗子唇膏，除了贵没缺点，巨好用
chunks.en: Malling Goz lip balm, the only downside is that it's expensive, but it's extremely effective.

chunks.zh: 多喝水 多喝水 多喝水！
chunks.en: Drink more water, drink more water, drink more water!

chunks.zh: 唇炎？
chunks.en: Cheilitis?

chunks.zh: 百肤邦， 有个修复润唇膏，效果还蛮不错
chunks.en: Baifubang has a repairing lip balm that works pretty well.

chunks.zh: 多喝白水, 一天两天没用, 长期喝,才能看到效果,  少喝茶
chunks.en: Drink more plain water. It won't work in a day or two. Drink it long term to see the effect. Drink less tea.

chunks.zh: 一个是干燥，也可能是缺乏维生素啥的跟你饮食习惯有关
chunks.en: One is dryness, and the other may be a lack of vitamins, which is related to your dietary habits.

chunks.zh: @JunNKG 什么原理啊, 现在是上班泡茶, 喝到下班, 不喝困啊😂
chunks.en: @JunNKG What's the principle behind that? I drink tea all day at work and don't feel sleepy. 😂

chunks.zh: 当年学生时代，动不动跟风买一根差不多 30 块的唇膏，自从有次买了个天际电热水壶，终于发现了片新大陆，原来喝热水就能解决。手抺的有蜀睿冻疮膏
chunks.en: Back in my student days, I used to follow the trend and buy lipsticks that cost around 30 yuan. Since I once bought a Tianji electric kettle, I finally discovered a new continent: drinking hot water can solve the problem.  I use Shu Rui frostbite cream on my hands.

chunks.zh: @ArthurTsang 我之前也干, chatGPT 问了一下, 好像分 2 点, 1.茶多酚和咖啡因会带走口腔水分. 2.茶水温度高, 也会导致口腔干燥.
chunks.en: @ArthurTsang I used to do that too. I asked ChatGPT, and it seems to be for 2 reasons: 1. Tea polyphenols and caffeine can draw moisture from the mouth. 2. High tea water temperature can also lead to dry mouth.

chunks.zh: 看了评论 先坚持喝水 看看效果
chunks.en: After reading the comments, I'll try sticking to drinking water first and see how it goes.

chunks.zh: 喝水， 吃维 B
chunks.en: Drink water and take Vitamin B.

chunks.zh: 可以试试小蓝罐，修复效果还不错
chunks.en: You can try the little blue tin (likely referring to a specific brand), the repairing effect is not bad.

chunks.zh: 多喝水 多吃水果
chunks.en: Drink more water and eat more fruit.

chunks.zh: 吃胡萝卜，蒸好的或者是炒过的，亲测有效。维生素 b 对我来说不管用
chunks.en: Eat carrots, steamed or stir-fried, personally tested and effective. Vitamin B doesn't work for me.

chunks.zh: 脱落性唇炎，建议还是找医生看看
chunks.en: Exfoliative cheilitis, it is recommended to see a doctor.

chunks.zh: 他克莫司软膏
chunks.en: Tacrolimus ointment

chunks.zh: 我的也是，嘴唇就不断的起皮不分春夏秋冬😭😭
chunks.en: Mine too, my lips are constantly peeling, regardless of spring, summer, autumn or winter 😭😭

chunks.zh: 京东搜索凡士林就行，我也脱，用的这个就好了。
chunks.en: Just search for Vaseline on JD.com. Mine was peeling too, and using this fixed it.
